肽.definition: peptide (two or more amino acids linked by peptide bonds CO-NH)

肽聚糖.definition: peptidoglycan (PG) or murein (polymer of sugars and amino acids forming cell wall)

肽鍵.definition: peptide bond CO-NH; bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical

肽鏈.definition: peptide chain (chain of amino acids making up protein)
